County Clare is looking solid today with 8 ft @ 14s WNW swell and fresh 17 mph SE winds. Crab Island and Doolin Point are your top picks, both offering good conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 13 ft @ 14s WSW with strong 23 mph WSW winds, making it poor for surfing. By the day after, we see a nice improvement with 7 ft @ 12s W swell and light 7 mph SSE winds, perfect for a fun session at spots like Crab Island and Doolin Point. Best: day after.
